body: GetUserName  and other native code  don't run quite right in the Docker environment. It's two parts   1  locale needs to be set right on build  fixable with a locale setting update  2  getlogin_r   still fails with the right locale because Docker environments don't have the best user support  User can be fixed by using login  which populates  run utmp   exec login  f root  VSO create date - 8/3/2015 22:07:00     VSO closed date - 8/5/2015 16:49:00
title: Fix Docker locale and user
